thread.section_title: PGS Gold & Coin Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PGS Gold & Coin | pgsgoldandcoin.com
thread.title: Catherine
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Catherine

author: Catherine
title: Catherine
text:
Having a suspicious and closely guarded nature, I was a little apprehensive and fearful of being taken advantage of, which was alleviated after sitting with their representative for close to 2 hours.
My parents had passed and I brought in items of different varieties; coins, jewelry, collectibles, etc...They're quite knowledgeable, and don't mind sharing that knowledge, and they are fair. I give PGS Gold & Coin a 5 Star Rating and have, and will keep recommending them.
